summary: The examples/logfire package demonstrates how to integrate Logfire’s structured logging with OpenAI model calls. It provides utilities for sending a text prompt to obtain a predefined classification label with confidence, and for extracting tabular data from images—optionally turning markdown tables into pandas DataFrames—while automatically recording request and response details.
business_intent: Show developers practical patterns for building AI‑enabled applications that require transparent, auditable interactions with OpenAI services, covering both text classification and image‑based data extraction, all with consistent Logfire logging.
